General.Name: AGM Group Holdings Inc Class A
General.Description: AGM Group Holdings Inc., a technology company, researches, develops, and sells of cryptocurrency mining machine and standardized computing equipment in Hong Kong, Singapore, and Mainland China. It also engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of technology hardware products, as well as offers financial technology software services. AGM Group Holdings Inc. was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Connaught Commercial Building, Wan Chai, Hong Kong

4.Name: Mr. Chong Chao Ma
4.Title: Chief Executive Officer of AGM Canada Holdings Limited
